summary: This document contains subscriber information for Jeffrey E. Epstein from Cingular Wireless, detailing his account status, billing information, and call usage over a specified period. It highlights his active account since April 3, 2004, and includes various call logs and billing details. This document contains detailed billing usage records for a Cingular Wireless account, including call logs, voicemail usage, and charges incurred during a specific billing cycle. The records span from July 6, 2006, to July 13, 2006, and include various locations, primarily in New York and other areas. This document contains detailed billing information for voice usage associated with a specific account number from Cingular Wireless. It includes call logs, charges, and locations for calls made on July 13 and July 14, 2006, highlighting various incoming and outgoing calls, including international calls to the UK and other locations. This document contains detailed billing information for voice usage on a Cingular Wireless account, including call dates, times, numbers called, and charges incurred. The data spans from July 15 to July 20, 2006, and includes numerous incoming and outgoing calls, primarily to and from the United Kingdom and France. This document contains detailed billing information for voice usage associated with a specific account number. It includes records of incoming and outgoing calls, their durations, charges, and locations, primarily focusing on calls made on July 20-23, 2006. The data suggests frequent communication with various locations, including New York and international calls to France and the United Kingdom. This document contains a detailed billing statement for voice usage associated with account number 994293235 for the billing cycle ending on July 25, 2006. It lists various incoming and outgoing calls, voicemail usage, and associated charges, primarily from locations in New York and Florida. This document contains detailed billing usage records for a specific account number, including voice and text usage over a specified period. It outlines the dates, times, and types of calls made, as well as the charges associated with them, indicating a high volume of communication activity. This document contains detailed billing and usage records for a Cingular Wireless account, including GPRS and SMS usage from July 13 to August 1, 2006. It outlines the charges incurred for various types of communications, including international calls and text messages, and indicates that the data is proprietary and confidential. This document contains unbilled usage reports for a Cingular Wireless account, detailing call and text message usage over a specified period. It includes data on the number of calls made, text messages sent, and associated charges, although it notes that the data may not be complete due to possible data losses.
